findings.title: Multiple CNCMintingRebalancingRewardsHandler can break the targeted CNC TotalSupply distribution
findings.description: Having multiple instances of CNCMintingRebalancingRewardsHandler can disrupt the intended TotalSupply distribution of CNC tokens.

findings.title: BaseConicPool's `usdExchangeRate()` might use outdated `_cachedTotalUnderlying`
findings.description: `usdExchangeRate()` uses `_cachedTotalUnderlying` for its calculation, but `_cachedTotalUnderlying` can be arbitrarily outdated, which might render `usdExchangeRate()` inaccurate.
